BPS Sebut Kenaikan Harga Daging Ayam Piicu Inflasi
01 Nov 2019, 10:19 by Eko Sulestyono


BPS Sebut Kenaikan Harga Daging Ayam Piicu Inflasi

KBRN, Jakarta : Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) melaporkan bahwa telah terjadi inflasi sebesar 0,02 persen sepanjang Oktober 2019. Menurut BPS, kenaikan sejumlah bahan pangan menyebabkan terjadinya inflasi di Indonesia.
Kepala BPS Pusat Suhariyanto saat menggelar acara jumpa pers di Jakarta mengatakan, BPS mencatat adanya kenaikan harga daging ayam ras yang akhirnya memicu terjadinya  inflasi sepanjang Oktober 2019. 
"Ada beberapa komoditas bahan makanan yang cenderung mengalami kenaikan, diantaranya harga daging ayam ras naik dan andilnya kepada inflasi 0,05 persen” kata Suhariyanto di Kantor BPS Pusat, Jalan dr. Soetomo, Pasar Baru, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Menurut Suhariyanto, ada beberapa komoditas lainnya yaitu bawang merah juga ikuti andil dalam menyumbang inflasi 0,02 persen. Sedangkan untuk kelompok bahan makanan jadi, minuman dan rokok juga ikut memberikan andil sebesar 0,08 persen terhadap inflasi Oktober 2019.
Sedangkan faktor lainnya yang memicu terjadinya deflasi  diantaranya adalah transportasi, komunikasi dan jasa keuangan tercatat mengalami deflasi sebesar 0,08 persen dengan andil 0,02 persen. 
Suhariyanto menjelaskan kepada wartawan di Jakarta bahwa pada Oktober 2019 inflasi inti tercacat sebesar 0,17 persen dengan andil sebesar 0,10 persen.
Menurut Suhariyanto, secara keseluruhan  inflasi yang terjadi pada Oktober 2019 sebesar 0,02 persen itu masih terkendali atau sesuai dengan target pemerintah. Hal itu menunjukkan bahwa kemampuan daya beli masyarakat secara keseluruhan masih relatif baik.

BPS Calls An Increase in Chicken Meat Prices Piicu Inflation
01 Nov 2019, 10:19 by Eko Sulestyono


BPS Calls An Increase in Chicken Meat Prices Piicu Inflation

KBRN, Jakarta: The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) reported that there had been an inflation of 0.02 percent during October 2019. According to BPS, an increase in a number of food items caused inflation in Indonesia.
Head of the Central BPS Suhariyanto when holding a press conference in Jakarta said, BPS noted an increase in the price of broiler chicken meat which eventually triggered inflation throughout October 2019.
"There are several food commodities that tend to increase, including the price of broiler chicken meat rises and contributes to 0.05 percent inflation," said Suhariyanto at the Central BPS Office, Jalan Dr. Soetomo, Pasar Baru, Central Jakarta, Friday (1/11 / 2019).
According to Suhariyanto, there were several other commodities, namely shallots, which also contributed to the inflation of 0.02 percent. As for the processed food, beverages and cigarettes group also contributed 0.08 percent to the inflation in October 2019.
While other factors that triggered deflation include transportation, communication and financial services recorded deflation of 0.08 percent with a share of 0.02 percent.
Suhariyanto explained to reporters in Jakarta that in October 2019 core inflation was damaged by 0.17 percent with a share of 0.10 percent.
According to Suhariyanto, overall inflation that occurred in October 2019 of 0.02 percent was still under control or in accordance with the government's target. This shows that the purchasing power of the community as a whole is still relatively good.
